From: J. David Oder
Sent: Sunday, May 3, 2020 9:40 AM
To: Taylor Lavery
Subject:

Taylor
My sincere apologies for interfering with your Sunday

First off, on a personal level, I am sorry for any problems that I have personally created for you. I
was not thinking clearly and did not intend to create issues for you with the transition.

On a separate note, I have kept quiet up until now, but want to reach out and see if we can open a
dialogue about my compensation.

I was told when I took the Shift4 job and the title of "President of Special Projects" that the only
project I had to work on was Card Connect. That meant that I was to be paid on any "new business
revenue" for that project.

I have been informed that you have changed that definition of what constitutes a "new account" by
coming up with the concept of "parent accounts", that now only count once.

I know it sounds ridiculous, but I truly did not know that Shift4 had been processing under those
merchant id's, until the Card Connect deal closed. This is despite my pleas to you and JR during
the pandemic to please put all of the MID's on Shift4 to save money.

I have also been informed that you are no longer paying me on Lighthouse revenue.

I'd like to get your feedback on how my compensation is now being handled by Shift4.

Also, I heard that I was not listed on the Card Connect integration call this past week. I would like
to continue to be informed and participate on those calls.

Dave

From: J. David Oder
To: Taylor Lavery
Sent: Sun, May 3, 2020 9:34 AM
Subject:

Taylor

Spoke with jarred last night, so he is aware

I want to work with shift4, and you in particular, to make sure all the merchants that can move, are
moved

With that said, I wanted to reach out to you about a couple of things:

My compensation
When I took the shift4 job, I was told that the only project I had was card connect, so I assume that
meant the legacy merchants and new merchants were all included in my compensation
It is my understanding that you are now trying to limit my compensation, due to the "parent" account
concept

Can you please explain that concept?

I am told all cc merchants were put in lighthouse. I was supposed to be paid on any new business
(lighthouse is a new product)
I am told That you are now not paying me on anything in lighthouse
Can you please explain this?

I believe I have tried to be cooperative, but I am very frustrated
I have been working on this deal since November
I don't believe I have been treated fairly.

Do you intend to continue to employ me?

I remain ready willing and able to fulfill our mutual goal of moving merchants over from card connect
to shift4 to realize those cost savings

Thanks

Dave
